StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateO.cerWaiverWeights]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaID int ,@RedWeights varchar(max) ,@GreenWeights varchar(max) ,@LastEditBy varchar(50))
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_WEIGHTS] WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_WEIGHTS] SET [NWA_ID] = @NWAID ,[RED_WEIGHTS] = @RedWeights ,[GREEN_WEIGHTS] = @GreenWeights ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_WEIGHTS] ([NWA_ID] ,[RED_WEIGHTS] ,[GREEN_WEIGHTS] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NWAID ,@RedWeights ,@GreenWeights ,@LastEditBy ,GETDATE()) END
